definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: However, it appears they may be revived in 2040.
sentences.chinese: 不過看上去他們打算在2040年重辦奧運會。

sentences.english: Next, you need to replace whatever you lost , your driver's license, things like that.
sentences.chinese: 接下來妳要重辦遺失的證件，像是駕照之類的東西。

sentences.english: Can I have my credit card reissued ?
sentences.chinese: 我可以重辦我的信用卡嗎？
